name: y
description: In this lab, you'll be **working in groups of 2-4 students** to implement OAuth for some chosen third party provider *OTHER THAN* GitHub. Your group must use the provided [starter code](https://github.com/codefellows/seattle-javascript-401n16/tree/master/class-12/lab-a/starter-code) to integrate your OAuth provider, and you must then assess and report on that provider's ease-of-use.
author: Sian Culligan Madison Stehle Randee Orion
